[et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”on” specialty=”off”][et_pb_fullwidth_image admin_label=”Image en pleine largeur” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/F_SDG_Goal_03-1.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”section” transparent_background=”off” background_color=”#313f55″ allow_player_pause=”off” inner_shadow=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off” padding_mobile=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” make_equal=”off” use_custom_gutter=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”dark” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” text_font_size=”20″]

THE SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT GOALS AT CONVERGENCES WORLD FORUM

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”dark” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Engaged since its creation in the promotion of the Sustainable Development Goals implementation, Convergences encourage the exchange and the creation of partnership between the actors invested in the construction of a world 3Zero.

Convergences World Forum 2017 choose for its 10th anniversary  to promote the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) 5, 6, 7, 9, 12 and 17 through dedicated sessions.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

SDG 5 

ACHIEVE GENDER EQUALITY AND EMPOWER ALL WOMEN AND GIRLS

 

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/E_SDG_Icons-05.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” url=”https://sustainabledevelopment.un.org/sdg5″ max_width=”113px”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Even if humanity made progress during the past decades in terms of women condition, a vast amount of women and girls suffer from agressions, inequalities and discrimination related to their gender. Sustainable development can be be reach and truly effective only with the equal participation and consideration of all its actors and the 5th goal must be a priority in the world agenda.  

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” button_url=”http://mailchi.mp/convergences2015/d85tftkm4p-1538509″ url_new_window=”off” button_text=”Discover some of our guests and sessions on SDG 5″ button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#00225e” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_button][et_pb_divider admin_label=”Séparateur” color=”#4b4a56″ show_divider=”on” divider_style=”solid” divider_position=”top” hide_on_mobile=”on”] [/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

SDGs 6 & 7

ENSURE AVAILABILITY AND SUSTAINABLE MANAGEMENT OF WATER AND SANITATION FOR ALL

ENSURE ACCESS TO AFFORDABLE, SUSTAINABLE AND MODERN ENERGY FOR ALL

 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/E_SDG_Icons-06.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” url=”https://sustainabledevelopment.un.org/sdg6″ max_width=”113px”] [/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/gg-7renewableenergy-english.png” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” url=”https://sustainabledevelopment.un.org/sdg7″ max_width=”113px”] [/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Water and Energies are determining elements in communities self-sufficiency and for the environmental issues. These resources can still be difficultly accessible in some part of the world and the innovation must find alternative solutions for a sustainable development.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” button_url=”http://mailchi.mp/convergences2015/d85tftkm4p-1538485″ url_new_window=”off” button_text=”Discover some of our guests and sessions on the SDGs 6 & 7″ button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#00225e” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_button][et_pb_divider admin_label=”Séparateur” color=”#4b4a56″ show_divider=”on” divider_style=”solid” divider_position=”top” hide_on_mobile=”on”] [/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

SDG 9 

BUILD RESILIENT INFRASTRUCTURE, PROMOTE INCLUSIVE AND SUSTAINABLE INDUSTRIALIZATION AND FOSTER INNOVATION

 

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/gg-9innovationandinfrastructure-english.png” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” url=”https://sustainabledevelopment.un.org/sdg9″ max_width=”113px”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Developed infrastructures and industrialisation are key points for territories gain of independency and for the viability of a sustainable development. Innovating for infrastructures and an industrialisation more eco-aware constitutes a big challenge for our societies.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” button_url=”http://mailchi.mp/convergences2015/d85tftkm4p-1538501″ url_new_window=”off” button_text=”Discover some of our guests and sessions on the SDG 9″ button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#00225e” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_button][et_pb_divider admin_label=”Séparateur” color=”#4b4a56″ show_divider=”on” divider_style=”solid” divider_position=”top” hide_on_mobile=”on”] [/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

SDG 12 

ENSURE SUSTAINABLE CONSUMPTION AND PRODUCTION PATTERNS

 

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/global-goals_12_1.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” url=”https://sustainabledevelopment.un.org/sdg12″ max_width=”113px”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

“Doing more with less”, that is what the change of way to consume aims at. By adopting more sustainable and responsible ways of consumption, the target is to reduce the economic, environmental and social cost of human activities.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” button_url=”http://mailchi.mp/convergences2015/d85tftkm4p-1538445″ url_new_window=”off” button_text=”Discover some of our guests and session on the SDG 12″ button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#00225e” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_button][et_pb_divider admin_label=”Séparateur” color=”#4b4a56″ show_divider=”on” divider_style=”solid” divider_position=”top” hide_on_mobile=”on”] [/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

SDG 17 

STRENGHTEN THE MEANS OF IMPLEMENTATION AND REVITALIZE THE GLOBAL PARTNERSHIP FOR SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/SDG17-300×300.jpg” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” url=”https://sustainabledevelopment.un.org/sdg17″ max_width=”113px”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

The importance of the partnerships diversity between actors from the private sector, public sector and from civil society is at the heart of Convergences activity. Convergences first mission is to make the different actors for a sustainable development converge in a grouped and efficient action.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” button_url=”http://mailchi.mp/convergences2015/d85tftkm4p-1538525″ url_new_window=”off” button_text=”Discover some of our guests and sessions on the SDG 17″ button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#00225e” button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_button][et_pb_divider admin_label=”Séparateur” color=”#4b4a56″ show_divider=”on” divider_style=”solid” divider_position=”top” hide_on_mobile=”on”] [/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Convergences World Forum 2017 choose for its 10th anniversary  to promote the Sustainable Development Goals […]
